Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 25th overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1981...
Injured on 6/1/1983 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 6/8/1984 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/1/1986, off Lonnie Myhre (MAN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/27/1986, off Forrest Brewer (Mal)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1986...
Signed as a free agent by Toledo on 2/9/1992 to a 3-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Won World Championship with Toledo in 1992...
